name: Choke
user_messages: You place your hand around %TARGET%'s neck, firmly choking %TARGET_PRONOUN_THEM%!
You place your hand around %TARGET%'s airway and start choking %TARGET_PRONOUN_THEM%.
You grab %TARGET% by the neck, squeezing %TARGET_PRONOUN_THEIR% throat!
target_messages: You feel %USER% place %USER_PRONOUN_THEIR% hand on your neck and choke you. It's difficult to breathe!
You choke as %USER% constricts your neck!
You feel a little light-headed as %USER% puts pressure on your airway!
You can feel %USER%'s fingers squeezing your throat!
